decision_conditions: <p>Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before the relevant work is commenced. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved:</p><p>a.) A section drawing showing details of how the solar panels would relate to the existing roof covering and how they would be fixed to the building ensuring those to the roof of the dormer as flush with the flat roof of the dormer.</p><p>REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building&nbsp;</p>

<p>The hereby approved windows shall all have integrated glazing bars and horns and be of 14mm window&nbsp; thickness.</p><p>REASON: To ensure the integrity and character of the property is preserved and that of the surrounding conservation area.</p>

Notwithstanding the hereby approved plans, the rooflights shall be of the conservation type, fitted flush with the existing roof slope and shall not project above the plane of the roof.REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to preserving the character and appearance of the Conservation Area, host building and terrace it is located within.

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
description: Proposed replacement of all existing windows with double glazed slimline windows. Insertion of 1x rooflight above existing outrigger and installation of solar panels
